name: Tiny Toy Tanks
description:
In Tiny Toy Tanks you are in control of a small blue tank. Your Goal is to destroy all the opposing tanks in 40+ hand crafted levels. Opposing tanks have different AI with different strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, every level has many other mechanics like TNT, Magnets and more.

The Tanks

Player controlled it can turbo and lay mines.
Brown Tanks Attack speed is slow and does not move
Gray Tanks Attack speed is slow and can move
Blue Tanks High-speed rockets
Yellow Tanks Can place mines
Green Tanks Super aim technology
Red Tanks Large number of rockets
Purple Tanks Evasion technology
